languages.text: {n}Слышен мучительный металлический скрип — это до предела сжался кулак аугментированной руки Соломона.{/n} "Оценка.. компетентности? Так и быть, я слушаю, префект".
{n}You hear a painful metallic creak as Solomorne's augmented hand clenches into a fist.{/n} "Competency... assessment? Very well, Prefect. I am listening."
languages.original_text: {n}Слышен мучительный металлический скрип — это до предела сжался кулак аугментированной руки Соломона.{/n} "Оценка.. компетентности? Так и быть, я слушаю, префект".

{n}You hear a painful metallic creak as Solomorne's augmented hand clenches into a fist.{/n} "Competency... assessment? Very well, Prefect. I am listening."

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンの強化義手が拳を握りしめると、金属がきしむ痛々しい音が響いた。{/n}「能力評価…なんだと？いいだろう、総監。聞こう」
languages.original_text: {n}You hear a painful metallic creak as Solomorne's augmented hand clenches into a fist.{/n} "Competency... assessment? Very well, Prefect. I am listening."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンの強化義手が拳を握りしめると、金属がきしむ痛々しい音が響いた。{/n}「懲戒…なんだと？いいだろう、総監。聞こう」

languages.text: {n}Du hörst ein metallisches Knirschen, als Solomorne seine augmentierte Faust ballt.{/n} "Kompetenz... beurteilung? Also schön, Präfektin. Ich bin ganz Ohr."
languages.original_text: {n}You hear a painful metallic creak as Solomorne's augmented hand clenches into a fist.{/n} "Competency... assessment? Very well, Prefect. I am listening."

traits.locale_text: {n}Du hörst ein metallisches Knirschen, als Solomorne seine augmentierte Faust ballt.{/n} "Kompetenz... beurteilung? Also schön, Präfektin. Ich bin ganz Ohr."

languages.text: {n}Un grincement métallique s'échappe de la main augmentée de Solomorne lorsqu'il serre le poing.{/n} « Une évaluation... de compétence ? Très bien, préfète. Je vous écoute. »
languages.original_text: {n}You hear a painful metallic creak as Solomorne's augmented hand clenches into a fist.{/n} "Competency... assessment? Very well, Prefect. I am listening."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un grincement métallique s'échappe de la main augmentée de Solomorne lorsqu'il serre le poing.{/n} « Une évaluation... de compétence ? Très bien, préfète. Je vous écoute. »

languages.text: {n}Oyes un doloroso crujido metálico cuando Solomorne cierra su mano aumentada en un apretado puño.{/n} «¿Evaluación... de competencia? Muy bien, Prefecta. Le escucho con atención».
languages.original_text: {n}You hear a painful metallic creak as Solomorne's augmented hand clenches into a fist.{/n} "Competency... assessment? Very well, Prefect. I am listening."

traits.locale_text: {n}Oyes un doloroso crujido metálico cuando Solomorne cierra su mano aumentada en un apretado puño.{/n} «¿Evaluación... de competencia? Muy bien, Prefecta. Le escucho con atención».

languages.text: {n}你听到一阵刺耳的金属嘎吱声，索罗蒙握紧了满是植入物的手。{/n}“能力……评审？很好，行政官，我听着呢。”
languages.original_text: {n}You hear a painful metallic creak as Solomorne's augmented hand clenches into a fist.{/n} "Competency... assessment? Very well, Prefect. I am listening."

traits.locale_text: {n}你听到一阵刺耳的金属嘎吱声，索罗蒙握紧了满是植入物的手。{/n}“能力……评审？很好，行政官，我听着呢。”

languages.text: {n}Solomorne'un ogmentli eli sıkılıp yumruk hâlini alırken metalik bir gıcırtı duyuyorsun.{/n} "Ehliyet... Değerlendirmesi mi? Pekâlâ Prefekt Hanım. Dinliyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}You hear a painful metallic creak as Solomorne's augmented hand clenches into a fist.{/n} "Competency... assessment? Very well, Prefect. I am listening."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne'un ogmentli eli sıkılıp yumruk hâlini alırken metalik bir gıcırtı duyuyorsun.{/n} "Ehliyet... Değerlendirmesi mi? Pekâlâ Prefekt Hanım. Dinliyorum."
